__e: Hi, we are looking for a patient that was just admitted, Ezra Fitz?
Dad, I know what you're gonna say... no, I'm not concerned with ezra Fitz.
Ezra Fitz is not the same person that you met on his book tour two years ago.
I took the rap for you and Ezra and Sean.
I can't believe you told Ezra and lived to talk about it.
"A" sent my dad a letter, trying to get him to catch me and Ezra, and now my mom's on the hunt to find out who "A" is.
With all this stuff about Ezra in my head, I don't even know what I was thinking.
And I know that Ezra can't look me in the eye when he lies. And when he told me he went home, he didn't...
Hey, there, it's Ezra. Can't talk, but you can, soon as you hear the...
- Ezra said he didn't do it.
Ezra needs a little time to himself right now.
They came here for something that I had hidden very, very well but somehow Ezra figured it out.
